languages.text: Ксеноса Ирлиэт, приближенную Лорд-капитана, обнаружили в одном из отсеков корабля в беспамятстве. Ксенос кричала что-то на своем бесовском наречии и держала руки воздетыми, будто удерживая на них некую неподъемную ношу. Охране не удалось привести ксеноса в чувство. Двое блюстителей, пытавшихся сдвинуть ее с места, получили смертельные раны и скончались на месте. Придя в себя спустя десять часов, ксенос соизволила объяснить, что видела, будто ее родной мир Крударах рушится вокруг нее, и лишь она может удержать его стены. Ксенос также заявила, что мон-кай не должны в следующий раз касаться ее без спроса, а с зовом варпа она будто бы справится сама.

traits.locale_text: Ксеноса Ирлиэт, приближенную Лорд-капитана, обнаружили в одном из отсеков корабля в беспамятстве. Ксенос кричала что-то на своем бесовском наречии и держала руки воздетыми, будто удерживая на них некую неподъемную ношу. Охране не удалось привести ксеноса в чувство. Двое стражей, пытавшихся сдвинуть ее с места, получили смертельные раны и скончались на месте. Придя в себя спустя десять часов, ксенос соизволила объяснить, что видела, будто ее родной мир Крударх рушится вокруг нее, и лишь она может удержать его стены. Ксенос также заявила, что мон-кай не должны в следующий раз касаться ее без спроса, а с зовом варпа она будто бы справится сама.

languages.text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.
languages.original_text: Ксеноса Ирлиэт, приближенную Лорд-капитана, обнаружили в одном из отсеков корабля в беспамятстве. Ксенос кричала что-то на своем бесовском наречии и держала руки воздетыми, будто удерживая на них некую неподъемную ношу. Охране не удалось привести ксеноса в чувство. Двое блюстителей, пытавшихся сдвинуть ее с места, получили смертельные раны и скончались на месте. Придя в себя спустя десять часов, ксенос соизволила объяснить, что видела, будто ее родной мир Крударах рушится вокруг нее, и лишь она может удержать его стены. Ксенос также заявила, что мон-кай не должны в следующий раз касаться ее без спроса, а с зовом варпа она будто бы справится сама.

traits.locale_text: Xenos Yrliet, one of Lord-captain's personal team, was found delirious in one of the compartments. She kept screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The guards were unable to do anything. The two who attempted to shove Yrliet aside were attack and died instantly. Yrliet came to about nine hours later and explained that she saw her homeworld of Krudarch was falling apart and she was the only one able to save its walls from destruction. She added that mon-keigh should never try to touch her again, since she could deal with the Warp herself.

She kept screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The guards were unable to do anything. Yrliet came to about nine hours later and explained that she saw her homeworld of Krudarch was falling apart and she was the only one able to save its walls from destruction. She added that mon-keigh should never try to touch her again, since she could deal with the Warp herself.

She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

languages.text: 领主舰长的私人随行人员异形伊莉耶特，是在飞船中的某个舱室中被发现的。她当时陷入了谵妄之中，用她那邪恶的语言尖叫着，双臂高高举过头顶，仿佛在努力阻止天塌下来。执法者们根本无法将她从恍惚中解救出来，其中两个执法者试图将伊莉耶特挪走，但却遭到了攻击，当场死亡。这位异形大约在十个小时之后恢复了神智。她解释说，她看到她的家园克鲁达拉赫在她眼前崩塌，而她是唯一一个还能支撑城墙的人。她说，在未经她允许的情况下，任何猴子都不应该再碰她。她还说，如果以后再发生类似的事情，她会以她自己的方式来对付亚空间的呼唤。
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长的私人随行人员异形伊莉耶特，是在飞船中的某个舱室中被发现的。她当时陷入了谵妄之中，用她那邪恶的语言尖叫着，双臂高高举过头顶，仿佛在努力阻止天塌下来。镇压者们根本无法将她从恍惚中解救出来，其中两个镇压者试图将伊莉耶特挪走，但却遭到了攻击，当场死亡。这位异形大约在十个小时之后恢复了神智。她解释说，她看到她的家园克鲁达拉赫在她眼前崩塌，而她是唯一一个还能支撑城墙的人。她说，在未经她允许的情况下，任何猴子都不应该再碰她。她还说，如果以后再发生类似的事情，她会以她自己的方式来对付亚空间的呼唤。

languages.text: La xenos Yrliet, miembro del séquito personal de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, apareció delirante en una de las bahías de la nave. Gritaba en su sacrílego lenguaje y tenía los brazos en alto, como si quisiera sujetar el cielo. El personal de seguridad no pudo liberarla del trance. Los dos miembros que intentaron moverla fueron atacados y murieron al instante. La xenos recuperó el conocimiento al cabo de unas diez horas. Explicó que había visto el colapso de su mundo natal, Crudarach, y que solo ella había podido sujetar sus muros. Añadió que ningún mon-keigh debía tocarla sin permiso y que en el futuro se ocuparía personalmente de la llamada de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

Los dos miembros que intentaron moverla fueron atacados y murieron al instante. La xenos recuperó el conocimiento al cabo de unas diez horas. Añadió que ningún mon-keigh debía tocarla sin permiso y que en el futuro se ocuparía personalmente de la llamada de la disformidad.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの随員の一人である異種族（ゼノ）のユリエットが、船内の船倉で錯乱状態になっているのを発見された。ユリエットは邪悪な言語で叫んでおり、まるで空が落ちるのを阻止するかのように両腕を頭上高く上げていた。執行官はトランス状態の彼女を解放できない。ユリエットを動かそうとした2人は攻撃を受け即死した。異種族は約10時間後に意識を取り戻した。彼女は故郷のクルダラが自身の周りで崩壊するのを目撃し、自分だけがその壁を支えていたのだと説明する。また、モン＝ケイは二度と許可なく自身に触れるなと付け加え、そして今後は〈歪み〉の呼びかけには彼女自身で対処すると告げた。
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの随員の一人である異種族（ゼノ）のユリエットが、船内の船倉で錯乱状態になっているのを発見された。ユリエットは邪悪な言語で叫んでおり、まるで空が落ちるのを阻止するかのように両腕を頭上高く上げていた。執行官はトランス状態の彼女を解放できない。ユリエットを動かそうとした2人は攻撃を受け即死した。異種族は約10時間後に意識を取り戻した。彼女は故郷のクルダラが自身の周りで崩壊するのを目撃し、自分だけがその壁を支えていたのだと説明する。また、モン＝ケイは二度と許可なく自身に触れるなと付け加え、そして今後は〈歪み〉の呼びかけには彼女自身で対処すると告げた。

languages.text: Die Xenos Yrliet aus dem persönlichen Gefolge des Lord Captains wurde in einem der Module des Schiffs im Delirium vorgefunden. Sie schrie in ihrer unheiligen Sprache um sich, die Arme hoch über den Kopf erhoben, als würde sie versuchen, den Himmel zu stützen, damit er nicht herunterfällt. Die Enforcers konnten sie nicht aus dieser Trance befreien. Zwei, die versuchten, Yrliet zu bewegen, wurden angegriffen und starben augenblicklich. Die Xenos erlangte etwa zehn Stunden später ihr Bewusstsein wieder. Sie erklärte, dass sie gesehen habe, wie ihre Heimatwelt Crudarach um sie herum zusammenbricht, und sie sei die Einzige gewesen, die die Wände stützen konnte. Und sie ergänzte noch, dass nie wieder irgendein Chem-Pan-Sey versuchen solle, sie ohne ihre Erlaubnis anzufassen. Und dass sie in Zukunft alleine mit den Einflüssen des Warp fertig werde.
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

Sie schrie in ihrer unheiligen Sprache um sich, die Arme hoch über den Kopf erhoben, als würde sie versuchen, den Himmel zu stützen, damit er nicht herunterfällt. Die Xenos erlangte etwa zehn Stunden später ihr Bewusstsein wieder. Sie erklärte, dass sie gesehen habe, wie ihre Heimatwelt Crudarach um sie herum zusammenbricht, und sie sei die Einzige gewesen, die die Wände stützen konnte. Und sie ergänzte noch, dass nie wieder irgendein Chem-Pan-Sey versuchen solle, sie ohne ihre Erlaubnis anzufassen. Und dass sie in Zukunft alleine mit den Einflüssen des Warp fertig werde.

languages.text: La xénos Yrliet, qui fait partie de l'escorte personnelle {mf|du|de la} seigneur-capitaine, a été retrouvée en plein délire dans l'une des baies du vaisseau. Elle hurlait dans sa langue impie, les bras levés au-dessus de sa tête, comme si elle tentait d'empêcher le ciel de s'écrouler. Les exécutants n'ont pas pu la libérer de sa transe. Les deux qui ont tenté de la faire bouger ont été attaqués et sont morts sur le champ. La xénos a repris conscience environ dix heures plus tard. Elle a expliqué avoir vu son monde natal de Crudarach s'effondrer autour d'elle et qu'elle était la seule à pouvoir empêcher les murs de s'écrouler. Elle a ajouté qu'aucun mon-keigh ne devait plus jamais la toucher sans permission, et qu'à l'avenir, elle s'occuperait de l'appel du Warp toute seule.
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın maiyetinden zeno Yrliet, geminin ambarlarından birinde kendinden geçmiş hâlde bulundu. Uğursuz dilinde çığlıklar atıyor, kollarını havada tutarak gökyüzünün düşmesini engellemeye çalışıyor gibi görünüyordu. İnfazcılar, Yrliet'i bu trans hâlinden çıkarmayı başaramadı. Onu hareket ettirmeye çalışan iki kişi, saldırısı sonucunda oracıkta can verdi. Yrliet, yaklaşık on saat sonra kendine geldi ve memleketi Crudarach'ın üzerine doğru yıkıldığını ve sadece kendisinin duvarları tutabildiğini gördüğünü açıkladı. Ayrıca mon-keighlerin, o izin vermedikçe kendisine dokunmamasını ve gelecekte öteboyutun çağrısıyla kendi kendine baş edebileceğini belirtti.
languages.original_text: The xenos Yrliet, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found delirious in one of the ship's bays. She was screaming in her unholy language, her arms raised high above her head, as if she was trying to keep the sky from falling. The enforcers were unable to free her from the trance. Two who attempted to move Yrliet were attacked and died instantly. The xenos regained awareness about ten hours later. She explained that she had seen her homeworld of Crudarach collapsing around her and she had been the only one able to hold up its walls. She added that no mon-keigh should ever touch her again without permission, and that, in the future, she would deal with the call of the warp on her own.
